description:
Imagine the fresh smells of October air, apples and falling leaves. Now lean back and imagine floating slowly down a river on an inner tube, feeling the sun and gentle bob of the waves. atPeace virtually takes you peaceful places where your mind can relax.

Feedback on atPeace: 
* "Best, best, best out there!"
* "Everything about this app is lovely - the concept, the characters, the messages..."
* "I didn't even realize this app gave me a huge grin until I quit out."
* "How did you do the grass animation?"

No one lives without stress, and every day we need to find moments of peace in a busy world. Launch this app, choose a destination, and find yourself “at peace”.

We are frequently building new peaceful scenes. Login and make a request!
http://lunchtimestudios.com/
